department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-12-18 at 02:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 02:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This is a request for a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of various Medical Gases including but not limited to; Oxygen, Nitrogen and Carbon Dioxide, on an ,and when required basis in Western Region. For the purposes of this solicitation, Western Region has been divided into the following Regions: Alberta, Manitoba and Saskatchewan.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Invitation to Bid - Medicine: Medical Gases
#### Solicitation Number: WS4227846731

**Solicitation Information**

*   *Solicitation Date:* 2023-11-08
*   *Closing Time:* 2023-12-18, 14:00:00 (EST)
*   *Description:* The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites suppliers to bid on a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of medical gases.

#### Tender Details

*   *Notice Type:* Request for Standing Offer
*   *Technical Criteria:* Suppliers must be able to provide medical gases on an “as and when required” basis in Western Region, which includes Alberta, Manitoba, and Saskatchewan.
*   *Trade Agreements:* The tender is open to suppliers who participate in the *Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement* and other trade agreements.
*   *Expected Contract Duration:* 2024-11-30
*   *Contact Information:*

    *   Name: Christopher Lau
    *   Contact Email: <christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
    *   Department: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)/Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Notice URL
To view the official Government of Canada posting announcement, please visit the following Ariba Discovery URL:

    https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17955593?extsite=MTc5NTU1OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
